name: LIT 288Y
title: Teoria Critica en America Latina
description: Overview of contemporary theoretical issues in Latin American cultural critique. Course topic changes; please see the Class Search for the current topic. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to graduate students.

class_notes: Topic: Migrations, LIT 288Y is taught in conjunction with LIT 230A-02.
